actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Asian Development Bank Act to authorize consent to, and authorize appropriations for, the United States contribution to the fifth replenishment of the Asian Development Fund, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Asian Development Bank Act to authorize the U.S. Governor of the Asian Development Bank to contribute a specified amount to the Asian Development Fund, subject to the availability of appropriations. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Asian Development Bank Act to authorize consent to, and authorize appropriations for, the United States contribution to the fifth replenishment of the Asian Development Fund, and for other purposes.
